metadata.synopsis: Karlach's inparty dialogue when she's in your party and you click on herOrder of nodes:1. Generic Blockers (Jaheira/Other avatar/Mindflayer)2. IPRDs (will override anything under it)3. Astarion's bite4. InRegion/specific situations branches5. Romance branches.6. Default greeting node.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Use companion debug to recruit Karlach + click on her

2.speaker: Karlach
2.text: Had to let off a little steam after facing off with those ignots.
2.context: CinematicNodeContext: Note to cinematic artist: Add cue for her to be burningNodeContext: IG-not, a Karlach-specific word for 'foolish person'

29.speaker: Karlach
29.text: Had to let off a little steam after facing off with those ignots.
29.context: CinematicNodeContext: Note to cinematic artist: Add cue for her to be burningNodeContext: IG-not, a Karlach-specific word for 'foolish person'

163.text: Had to let off a little steam after facing off with those ignots.
163.context: CinematicNodeContext: Note to cinematic artist: Add cue for her to be burningNodeContext: IG-not, a Karlach-specific word for 'foolish person'

130.speaker: Karlach
130.text: Had to let off a little steam after facing off with those ignots.
130.context: CinematicNodeContext: Note to cinematic artist: Add cue for her to be burningNodeContext: IG-not, a Karlach-specific word for 'foolish person'

152.speaker: Karlach
152.text: Granted the fire's lasting a little longer than it should. How do I look?
152.context: NodeContext: A little nervous but  trying not to show it.

90.speaker: Player
90.text: Like you should've melted a long time ago. How can you stand it?
90.context: CinematicNodeContext: After her line, she shudders and shakes herself off. The flames die down and vanish.

111.speaker: Karlach
111.text: Honey, I could go all night.
111.context: CinematicNodeContext: After her line, she shudders and shakes herself off. The flames die down and vanish.

147.speaker: Player
147.context: CinematicNodeContext: After her line, she shudders and shakes herself off. The flames die down and vanish.

154.speaker: Karlach
154.text: Careful, soldier. If I burn any hotter, I might explode.
154.context: CinematicNodeContext: After her line, she shudders and shakes herself off. The flames die down and vanish.

27.speaker: Player
27.text: Slightly mad, to be honest. Are you all right?
27.context: CinematicNodeContext: After her line, she shudders and shakes herself off. The flames die down and vanish.

115.speaker: Karlach
115.text: Who, me? This is the best day I've had in years.
115.context: CinematicNodeContext: After her line, she shudders and shakes herself off. The flames die down and vanish.

169.speaker: Karlach
169.text: What about it? Had to let off a little steam after facing off with those ignots.
169.context: CinematicNodeContext: Note to cinematic artist: No cue for being on fire.

159.text: What about it? Had to let off a little steam after facing off with those ignots.
159.context: CinematicNodeContext: Note to cinematic artist: No cue for being on fire.

177.speaker: Karlach
177.text: What about it? Had to let off a little steam after facing off with those ignots.
177.context: CinematicNodeContext: Note to cinematic artist: No cue for being on fire.

73.speaker: Karlach
73.text: Granted the fire lasted a little longer than it should.
73.context:
CinematicNodeContext: "Hear that?"
She thumps her left chest with right hand, like pounding a car hood. Something mechanic clangs within.
(etc.)

105.speaker: Player
105.text: How could you withstand the heat?
105.context:
CinematicNodeContext: "Hear that?"
She thumps her left chest with right hand, like pounding a car hood. Something mechanic clangs within.
(etc.)

74.speaker: Karlach
74.text: Hear that? Infernal engine for a heart. Lets me burn as hot as the Hells. Seems to be running in overdrive since I left Avernus.
74.context:
CinematicNodeContext: "Hear that?"
She thumps her left chest with right hand, like pounding a car hood. Something mechanic clangs within.
(etc.)

153.speaker: Karlach
153.text: Won't be seeing my mechanic any time soon, so I'll just make the most of the extra heat. Just don't get too close 'til I've found a way to calm it down.

162.speaker: Player
162.text: How the hells did you get an infernal engine for a heart?

15.speaker: Karlach
15.text: High pain tolerance. And a dynamic duo of truly shitty bosses.

21.speaker: Karlach
21.text: But it's a bit early in the game to be getting into tragic backstories. Let's save the scar-show for later, after we've worked up an appetite for tragedy.

165.speaker: Karlach
165.text: Meanwhile, I'll need to find someone who can tune up my engine sooner rather than later. Believe me when I say this thing is hot.

146.speaker: Karlach
146.text: The first time I faced down those 'paladins,' they let slip there was an infernal mechanic in the area. A tiefling. He might be able to stabilise things - if I can find him.

173.speaker: Player
173.text: Wonder if they meant Dammon - a tiefling weaponsmith.

142.speaker: Karlach
142.text: A weaponsmith, huh? Not sure if he's the guy, but I'd love to find out. A tune-up would do this rusty heart a world of good.

127.speaker: Player
127.text: There are some tieflings holed up in a druid's grove nearby. We might look there.

84.speaker: Karlach
84.text: Sounds like a good lead. Hopefully, our guy will be among them. A tune-up would do this old tub a world of good.

56.speaker: Player
56.text: I'll keep an eye out for someone like that.

156.speaker: Karlach
156.text: Thanking you. A tune-up would give this rustbox of mine a new lease on life.

52.speaker: Player
52.text: What'll happen if you don't get tuned up?

70.speaker: Karlach
70.text: Who knows! Maybe I can run like this indefinitely. But... maybe not.

123.speaker: Player
123.text: You have a mechanic for your heart?

17.speaker: Karlach
17.text: Wild, right? And believe it or not, I'm one of Zariel's least-mutilated pets.

45.speaker: Player
45.text: What does the engine allow you to do?

157.speaker: Karlach
157.text: Burn, baby. As hot as I can tolerate. Makes me a beast in battle. Hardly remember what I was like before it.

175.speaker: Player
175.text: I met someone who might be able to help - a smith who worked in the Hells for a time.

117.speaker: Karlach
117.text: Well now! Maybe I could make his acquaintance? A tightened screw or two might let me keep a little calmer.

72.speaker: Karlach
72.text: Maybe even manage a pat or bump without burning someone to death. It's been a long time.

26.speaker: Karlach
26.text: Let's go find your friend before I blow a gasket. Lead on!

96.speaker: Karlach
96.text: Engine heats up the whole system enough not to get burned. Hopefully it'll hold together long enough to get tuned up.

10.speaker: Player
10.text: I liked the look of it.

49.speaker: Player
49.text: Does it always last that long?

99.speaker: Karlach
99.text: Nope. Not sure how good it is for the gears, either.

6.speaker: Karlach
6.text: Hopefully it'll hold together long enough to get tuned up.

62.speaker: Karlach
62.text: Let's move, eh? I'm running high and in the mood for a fight.

22.speaker: Karlach
22.text: You... did? Wow. That was sound of you. Why'd you do it?
22.context: NodeContext: Wanting to accept the favor but experience has made her wary of trusting (this is early in her relationship to the player)

48.speaker: Karlach
48.text: You... did? Wow. That was sound of you. Why'd you do it?
48.context: NodeContext: Wanting to accept the favor but experience has made her wary of trusting (this is early in her relationship to the player)

126.speaker: Player
126.text: I always take care of my people.

103.speaker: Karlach
103.text: Glad to be counted among them. Really glad.

53.speaker: Player
53.text: They were agents of a devil. I wasn't going to let them roam the area unchallenged.

133.speaker: Karlach
133.text: Wish I could've been there to watch those ignots crumble, but I'm just happy they're off my tail.

71.speaker: Player
71.text: I'm always keen for a good fight.
71.context: NodeContext: She's about to explain her infernal heart for the first time.

172.speaker: Karlach
172.text: Same. Wish you would've brought me along for the ride, but I'm just happy those ignots are off my tail.
172.context: NodeContext: She's about to explain her infernal heart for the first time.

121.speaker: Karlach
121.text: Then again, facing 'em down might've put my tin can into overdrive.
121.context: NodeContext: She's about to explain her infernal heart for the first time.

16.speaker: Karlach
16.text: Thanks to you, I'll live to fight another day. And get this bloody thing tuned up.

50.speaker: Karlach
50.text: Felt good letting off a little steam after facing off with this ignots.
50.context: NodeContext: IG-not, a Karlach-specific swear meaning 'foolish person'

51.speaker: Karlach
51.text: Felt good letting off a little steam after facing off with this ignots.
51.context: NodeContext: IG-not, a Karlach-specific swear meaning 'foolish person'

58.speaker: Karlach
58.text: Felt good letting off a little steam after facing off with this ignots.
58.context: NodeContext: IG-not, a Karlach-specific swear meaning 'foolish person'

94.text: Granted the fire lasted a little longer than it should.
94.context: CinematicNodeContext: Note to cinematic artist: No cue for being on fire.

30.speaker: Karlach
30.text: Granted the fire lasted a little longer than it should.
30.context: CinematicNodeContext: Note to cinematic artist: No cue for being on fire.

75.speaker: Karlach
75.text: Help me kill those Paladins of Tyr, and I'll tell you. A bit of good gossip for your good help.
75.context: NodeContext: Being a little deadpan here. She's about to tell the story of her heart being replaced. Feed into the 'The year? Ten ere.' line.

13.speaker: Karlach
13.text: Help me kill those Paladins of Tyr, and I'll tell you. A bit of good gossip for your good help.
13.context: NodeContext: Being a little deadpan here. She's about to tell the story of her heart being replaced. Feed into the 'The year? Ten ere.' line.

91.speaker: Karlach
91.text: It's a long story. But a good one.
91.context: NodeContext: Being a little deadpan here. She's about to tell the story of her heart being replaced. Feed into the 'The year? Ten ere.' line.

81.speaker: Karlach
81.context: NodeContext: Almost giddy. She just got her engine fixed with the 2nd upgrade.

104.speaker: Karlach
104.context: NodeContext: Almost giddy. She just got her engine fixed with the 2nd upgrade.

116.speaker: Karlach
116.context: NodeContext: Almost giddy. She just got her engine fixed with the 2nd upgrade.

134.speaker: Karlach
134.context: NodeContext: Almost giddy. She just got her engine fixed with the 2nd upgrade.

143.speaker: Karlach
143.context: NodeContext: Almost giddy. She just got her engine fixed with the 2nd upgrade.

144.speaker: Karlach
144.context: NodeContext: Almost giddy. She just got her engine fixed with the 2nd upgrade.

67.speaker: Player
67.text: How did you end up with such a contraption in your chest?
67.context: NodeContext: Almost giddy. She just got her engine fixed with the 2nd upgrade.

89.speaker: Karlach
89.text: I'll tell you all about it, after we've taken down those 'paladins' I'm after. Believe me - it's worth the wait.

168.speaker: Player
168.text: It sounds like all we need to do to fix your engine is find some infernal iron.
168.context: NodeContext: Almost giddy. She just got her engine fixed with the 2nd upgrade.

28.speaker: Karlach
28.text: Let's hope Dammon is as good as he seems. Once my engine's handled, I can focus on more important matters - tadpoles, cults, frosty pints...

88.speaker: Player
88.text: So not only do you have this thing in your chest, but it's burning up?
88.context: NodeContext: Almost giddy. She just got her engine fixed with the 2nd upgrade.

106.speaker: Karlach
106.text: That's the short of it. Bloody thing's been in overdrive since I left Avernus.

93.speaker: Player
93.text: You got your second upgrade. How does it feel?
93.context: NodeContext: Almost giddy. She just got her engine fixed with the 2nd upgrade.

145.speaker: Karlach
145.text: Incredible. Like I'm really alive. Like we can finally be real.
145.context: NodeContext: Almost giddy. She just got her engine fixed with the 2nd upgrade.

34.speaker: Karlach
34.text: I can be close to you now. Without fear. Without thinking too hard. We can just... be.
34.context: NodeContext: She's pleased her engine is fixed.

118.speaker: Player
118.text: I've never been more excited for anything in my life.
118.context: NodeContext: Sweetly, in response to 'let's meet up later'

3.speaker: Karlach
3.text: I was hoping you'd say that.
3.context: NodeContext: Sweetly, in response to 'let's meet up later'

47.speaker: Player
47.text: You've earned it, after all you've endured.
47.context: NodeContext: The repetition of now/now is intentional - she's stumbling over her words a tiny bit. She's just excited and trying to make sense of things.

85.speaker: Karlach
85.text: No more than anyone else. Well. Maybe slightly more. But that's the past now. I'm free. More free than I've ever been, now.

164.speaker: Player
164.text: What about what Dammon said? About how your engine won't survive in the material plane?
164.context: NodeContext: The repetition of now/now is intentional - she's stumbling over her words a tiny bit. She's just excited and trying to make sense of things.

59.speaker: Karlach
59.text: I don't want to think about that now. I want to think about now. I'm so happy. That's all I need to know.
59.context: NodeContext: The repetition of now/now is intentional - she's stumbling over her words a tiny bit. She's just excited and trying to make sense of things.

161.speaker: Karlach
161.text: Like I got something back - something I've wanted for a really long time.

120.speaker: Karlach
120.text: When you put your hand on me, I was finally a closed circuit. Complete.

42.speaker: Karlach
42.text: When you hugged me, I felt warm inside... not hot, not burning. Warm and light. I was so happy.

76.speaker: Karlach
76.text: When you kissed me, I was... I don't know if I have the words.

19.speaker: Karlach
19.text: When I touched you, I felt like... a real person.

140.speaker: Karlach
140.text: My heart was racing, but I didn't hurt you. I don't have to be afraid of myself anymore.
140.context: NodeContext: Not a romance branch, she's just getting into her metaphor. She's talking about getting her engine fixes and being able to touch people.

135.speaker: Karlach
135.text: I don't have to hold back.
135.context: NodeContext: A little low, a litlte vulnerable. She knows she's gonna have to deal with hard truths later, but right now she just wants to shake hands with the world.

0.speaker: Karlach
0.text: Not sure the world's ready for unleashed Karlach, but it's getting it anyway. Thanks to Dammon. Thanks to you. Thanks to fate.
0.context: NodeContext: A little low, a litlte vulnerable. She knows she's gonna have to deal with hard truths later, but right now she just wants to shake hands with the world.

155.speaker: Player
155.text: What about what Dammon said? About how your engine won't survive in the material plane?
155.context: NodeContext: A little low, a litlte vulnerable. She knows she's gonna have to deal with hard truths later, but right now she just wants to shake hands with the world.

44.speaker: Karlach
44.text: Ugh, I don't want to think about that now.
44.context: NodeContext: A little low, a litlte vulnerable. She knows she's gonna have to deal with hard truths later, but right now she just wants to shake hands with the world.

125.speaker: Karlach
125.text: Misery always overstays its welcome. And joy leaves too soon. I'll cry later, but not now.
125.context: NodeContext: A little low, a litlte vulnerable. She knows she's gonna have to deal with hard truths later, but right now she just wants to shake hands with the world.

7.speaker: Player
7.text: What'll you do with your newfound freedom?
7.context: NodeContext: Maybe: Waggling fingers like she's gonna go around touching stuff.

100.speaker: Karlach
100.text: TOUCH! Touch everything. Touch everyone that'll let me. Shake hands. Dance a waltz. Maybe even kiss a face or two, if I find a good candidate.
100.context: NodeContext: Maybe: Waggling fingers like she's gonna go around touching stuff.

23.speaker: Karlach
23.context: NodeContext: Maybe: Waggling fingers like she's gonna go around touching stuff.

25.speaker: Player
25.text: I'm very glad you got what you wanted.

113.speaker: Karlach
113.text: Me too, soldier. Gods! Me too. For every knock we take, I feel like I get a little treat just to keep me going.

122.speaker: Player
122.text: Looks like Soul Coins are really feeding your engine's fire.
122.context: NodeContext: On 'enticed' she's saying if she gets turned on, the flames start to go nuts.

167.speaker: Karlach
167.text: Incredible, right? Keep 'em coming. I can handle it.

5.speaker: Player
5.text: How do you like the upgrade to your engine?
5.context: NodeContext: On 'enticed' she's saying if she gets turned on, the flames start to go nuts.

68.speaker: Karlach
68.text: I'm just happy to know someone can do something about this little situation. Thought I was alone but I'm not, am I?

69.speaker: Karlach
69.text: With your help - and Dammon's - I might be able to get a little more control over this thing. None too soon either - it's starting to wear me out a bit.

8.speaker: Player
8.text: What does that infernal engine do to you?
8.context: NodeContext: On 'enticed' she's saying if she gets turned on, the flames start to go nuts.

108.speaker: Karlach
108.text: Gives me energy. Power. But you've seen it in action - very hard to control.
108.context: NodeContext: On 'enticed' she's saying if she gets turned on, the flames start to go nuts.

129.speaker: Karlach
129.text: If I'm excited at all - angry, nervous, delighted, enticed... I burn hot. Hot enough to burn anyone who gets close.
129.context: NodeContext: On 'enticed' she's saying if she gets turned on, the flames start to go nuts.

110.speaker: Player
110.context: NodeContext: Light in tone, this shouldn't be too down-beat, though she is sincere.

1.speaker: Karlach
1.text: I try not to think about it. I still think about it constantly, but, you know, I try.

83.speaker: Karlach
83.text: One of these days I'll sort the whole infernal affair out, get myself cooled off, and start making up for lost time.

46.speaker: Player
46.context: NodeContext: Light in tone, this shouldn't be too down-beat, though she is sincere.

60.speaker: Karlach
60.text: Agonising! Gods! What I wouldn't give for a hug. A pat! Anything!
60.context: NodeContext: Light in tone, this shouldn't be too down-beat, though she is sincere.

43.speaker: Karlach
43.text: You've never met anyone so desperate for a hug as this one right here. Pathetic, perhaps, but true. It's my lot to bear, and I bear it badly.
43.context: NodeContext: Light in tone, this shouldn't be too down-beat, though she is sincere.

65.speaker: Karlach
65.text: Ah well. Can't have it all, can you. Not today, at least.

31.speaker: Player
31.text: I wouldn't mind that myself. I've never been one for too much contact.

136.speaker: Karlach
136.text: I'd trade you if I could. I miss it more than anything.

38.speaker: Karlach
38.text: But hey. That's life. Or so I'm told.

148.speaker: Karlach
148.text: Phew. Had to let off a little steam after facing off with those ignots.
148.context: NodeContext: IG-not, a Karlach-specific swear meaning 'foolish person'

57.text: Granted the fire's lasting a little longer than it should. How do I look?
57.context: NodeContext: A little nervous but  trying not to show it.

109.speaker: Karlach
109.text: Granted the fire's lasting a little longer than it should. How do I look?
109.context: NodeContext: A little nervous but  trying not to show it.

151.speaker: Karlach
151.text: Why not. Let me see if I can paint you a picture.
151.context: NodeContext: Like she's an old timey radio announcer teeing up a story

11.speaker: Karlach
11.text: The year? Ten ere. The place? A sleepy little town called Baldur's Gate. Our hero? Karlach, a knock-kneed delinquent from the Outer City with everything to give and nothing to lose.
11.context: NodeContext: Like she's an old timey radio announcer teeing up a story

101.speaker: Karlach
101.text: I was a kid looking for a way to fill my days and make some cash when I fell into the wrong crowd. Worked for a guy I respected. A lot. Turns out the feeling wasn't mutual.
101.context: NodeContext: Laughs, brings the story back to reality.

138.speaker: Karlach
138.text: Through the jigs and the reels, he made a deal with Zariel behind my back. You know Zariel, right? Archdevil of Avernus?

170.speaker: Karlach
170.text: She put this thing in my chest and set me to work. Well, to war. I learned quick how to stay alive. And the engine served me when it came to killing devils.

132.speaker: Karlach
132.text: Ten years of that. The stories I could tell.

86.speaker: Player
86.text: You mentioned a boss who gave you up to Zariel. Who was it?

12.speaker: Karlach
12.text: Guy named Gortash. Politician. Inventor. One of these wheeler-dealer types who seems to have a finger in every pie.

137.speaker: Karlach
137.text: I guess I was naive to think everything he got up to was above board. What did I know? I saw a job - a good job - with people I liked doing work I was good at.

37.speaker: Karlach
37.text: Sometimes I'm jealous of that girl. Ugh, to feel so invincible again.

97.speaker: Karlach
97.text: I'll mete out the best ones, bit by bit, so you always have a reason to keep me around. Clever, right?

128.speaker: Player
128.text: In your expert opinion, what's the best way to kill a devil?
128.context: NodeContext: Player has asked Karlach about how to kill demons/ devils, and though she hated fighting for Zariel, she's a master of martial prowess and loves talking about her techniques. In these nodes, it's like someone has asked her about her special interest hobby and she's really into explaining the nuances.

131.speaker: Karlach
131.text: Depends on the type. Ice devils hate an inferno, but that's an easy one. Orthons love projectiles - what they don't love is getting their bombs lobbed right back in their faces.
131.context: NodeContext: Player has asked Karlach about how to kill demons/ devils, and though she hated fighting for Zariel, she's a master of martial prowess and loves talking about her techniques. In these nodes, it's like someone has asked her about her special interest hobby and she's really into explaining the nuances.

102.speaker: Karlach
102.text: Demons, on the other hand - every demon is absolutely singular. You can't ever think you've got 'em typed out.
102.context: NodeContext: Player has asked Karlach about how to kill demons/ devils, and though she hated fighting for Zariel, she's a master of martial prowess and loves talking about her techniques. In these nodes, it's like someone has asked her about her special interest hobby and she's really into explaining the nuances.

41.speaker: Karlach
41.text: Sharp instincts, sharp weapons, and a knack for improvisation. That's the only way to survive 'em.
41.context: NodeContext: Player has asked Karlach about how to kill demons/ devils, and though she hated fighting for Zariel, she's a master of martial prowess and loves talking about her techniques. In these nodes, it's like someone has asked her about her special interest hobby and she's really into explaining the nuances.

55.speaker: Karlach
55.text: Anyway, what were we talking about?
55.context: NodeContext: Suddenly snapping out of explaining how to kill demons, realizing she was getting really into it, and coming back down to earth as it were.

36.speaker: Karlach
36.text: The two of them conspired to give me a little gift.
